about_the_game:
Professor Gilroy's Guide to Fey

By: NevernotDM My name is Professor Gilligan G. Gilroy and I have dedicated my life to the study of the fey folk that share our world. I have traveled to the rocky coasts where Selkies sing and the damp moors where Grindylow dwell. I have sat with the Wandering Man and danced with Veela. And I must tell you, dear reader, that despite your grandmother's warnings, these creatures are more than just monsters." 
Professor Gilroy's Guide to Fey brings you creatures that are more than just piles of hit points to be slaughtered by your players. Many of the creatures in the Guide can be used as quest givers, beloved NPCs, or present challenges that cannot be solved through traditional means. 
Use this module to give you the tools to create dynamic, memorable encounters both inside AND outside of combat.
Going beyond the creature design, each entry includes detailed lore, favored tactics, and encounter hooks to spark your imagination.    Many of the entries include magical items and mystical boons as loot or rewards for your players.    This potent combination lets you spend more time playing and less time prepping.

Professor Gilroy's Guide to Fey contains:
  • 54 new, beautifully illustrated creatures with detailed lore and monster tactics
  • 5 beautiful fey maps
  • 4 new ancestries
  • 200+ Encounter hooks to spark your imagination
